item.description:
It's the day before the day before New Year's Eve, not quite a penultimate New Year's Eve get together but close enough.

It will be an opportunity to chat and, perhaps, share with each other some of our goals for the coming year and the ups and downs of the year that is concluding.  We're a philosophy group after all, so we can wax philosophical about anything ranging from the personal to the global (and beyond?) 

We'll be meeting at a popular Harvard Square location.

Happy Holidays to all!

 

 ****************************************************

Menu 

While a minimum  expenditure of $10 on food and/or drink is a group requirement, you are strongly encouraged to purchase a meal or its equivalent in cost.   The restaurant is making ample space available for our use, so please do not take advantage by ordering e.g. "just a Coke."  We would like them to welcome us back for future events!  By attending this event you hereby agree to this policy. 

No Show Policy (PLEASE READ)
item.name: A New Year's Welcoming Party
